name: FattoreMamma Advertising Plugin
author: colorinside studio

sections.description:
This plugin is reserved for FattoreMamma Network Bloggers. This plugin is used to place private advertising slots.

Main Features

  • Insert authorized unit/zone ID into post
  • Reserved to FattoreMamma Network Bloggers

Support

We provide support for our plugin on https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/fm-adv
sections.installation:
1. Put the plug-in folder into [wordpress_dir]/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go into the WordPress admin interface and activate the plugin
  3. Go to FattoreMamma ADV options page and add your unit/zone ID
sections.changelog:
Version 0.3.3
– New Translations

Version 0.3.2
– Namespace Fixes and New TextDomain

Version 0.3.1
– Official first release
